price: (62) Allāh is the Creator of all things, and He is, over all things, Disposer of affairs.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَكِيلٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: al-lahu khāliqu kulli shayin wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin wakīlun
